blogPost.title: Mark Cuban to WallStreetBets traders: ‘Thanks for changing the game — thanks for taking on Wall Street’ https://t.co/5prrz9QHkF
blogPost.author: MarketWatch

localize.full_text: 马克-库班（Mark Cuban）对WallStreetBets交易员说："感谢你改变了游戏规则--感谢你对华尔街的挑战 "https://t.co/5prrz9QHkF。
馬克-庫班（Mark Cuban）對WallStreetBets交易員說："感謝你改變了遊戲規則--感謝你對華爾街的挑戰 "https://t.co/5prrz9QHkF。

previous.excerpt: uPaste for Mac will record and organize your copy/paste history automatically. Then you can use your pasteboard content anytime, any where with elegant beautiful UI.
previous.title: uPaste - Smart clipboard manager for Mac

localize.description: uPaste for Mac将自动记录和组织您的复制/粘贴历史。然后，你可以随时随地使用你的粘贴板内容与优雅美丽的用户界面。
localize.tagline: 适用于Mac的智能剪贴板管理器

localize.description: uPaste for Mac將自動記錄和組織您的複製/粘貼歷史。然後，你可以隨時隨地使用你的粘貼板內容與優雅美麗的用戶界面。
localize.tagline: 適用於Mac的智能剪貼板管理器

next.excerpt: Blogstreak is the tool library for your blog. If you want nice clap and comments for your static blog then look no further blogstreak has the answer. Blogstreak using latest webcomponent technology so it's highly customisable.
next.title: Blogstreak - All things needed for running static blog
